name: Mirrors: "A Happiness Series Game"
description:
Mirrors

You play as a child who's mother disappears one morning, you embark on your journey to uncover what happened to your mother.

Happiness Series

The happiness series is a series of horror games that will be releasing over time, each horror game will improve over the last in various ways using your feedback! We want our horror games to give a chill to the player, suspense and of course fear. You can help me improve future games by giving feedback.

BlueDartEntertainment@gmail.com

Features

The game was created in 2 days just in time for halloween so do not expect a fully dished out horror game, this is simply a short horror game to play for fun!

Features Include:

  • 2 Possible Endings
  • Avg. 20 Minutes Gameplay
  • Creepy Atmosphere
  • Storyline
  • Jumpscares
  • Puzzles
  • Lighting Options (For those who find it too uncomfortable)
BlueDart

Be sure to check out my other projects over on Gamejolt, all future projects will be uploaded here. I made "Mirrors" Halloween of 2017 and was recently reminded of it's existence and decided to upload it here, although I still have a passion for game development and would love to further continue creating horror games, preferably better horror games, I am aware of how hard game development is and without the skills needed to make assets and environments by myself making good horror games is a challenge. I hope to upload more projects here in the future and maybe one day start a team to create even better ones. 

Thanks for checking out "Mirrors"!
